entry.title: Upcoming Datacenter Upgrades
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 11, 17:00 UTC  -  Sep 19, 22:00 UTC

Sep 2, 19:31 UTC
Scheduled - Throughout the month of September 2021, we will be performing maintenance on various datacenters. Each window will be between 1am-6am local time of the data center. There is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during these maintenance windows. The most up-to-date schedule can be located here: Planned maintenance for Cloudflare data centers.

entry.title: Issues with viewing analytics and logs in Cloudflare for Teams Dashboard.
entry.content:
Sep 8, 00:33 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 8, 00:17 UTC
Update - Cloudflare is investigating issues viewing Gateway analytics and logging within the Cloudflare for Teams dashboard. Some users are reporting errors when attempting to view logs. This does not impact Gateway HTTP or DNS policy enforcement. Gateway logs are still being captured, but are not visible in the dashboard.

Sep 7, 23:38 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues viewing Gateway analytics and logging within the Cloudflare for Teams dashboard. Some users are reporting errors when attempting to view logs. This does not impact Gateway HTTP or DNS policy enforcement.

entry.title: Performance issue with public resolver 1.1.1.1 in San Jose, CA and Newark, NJ
entry.content:
Sep 8, 00:23 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 8, 00:20 UTC
Identified - We are rolling out a fix for resolving a performance issue with our Public Resolver 1.1.1.1 server that were observed in San Jose, CA and Newark, NJ.

entry.title: Dashboard Maintenance
entry.content:
Sep 7, 23:28 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 7, 23:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 23, 22:29 UTC
Scheduled - The Cloudflare Dashboard will be unavailable during this maintenance window in order to improve future resiliency of the system. All dashboard UI actions will be unavailable during the window. Cloudflare's API and edge will be unaffected during this maintenance.

entry.title: Issues with Wrangler tail sending logs
entry.content:
Sep 7, 18:45 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 7, 18:41 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 7, 18:39 UTC
Investigating - Workers customers make experience issue using tailing logs through the Cloudflare dashboard and Wrangler.

entry.title: Cloudflare Dashboard and Cloudflare API service issues in EMEA region
entry.content:
Sep 7, 03:20 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 7, 03:12 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 7, 02:48 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 7, 02:40 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs in EMEA region.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Dashboard / Cloudflare APIs are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

entry.title: Network Performance Issues in San Jose, United States
entry.content:
Sep 7, 00:30 UTC
Resolved - There was a brief network performance issue SJC colo/San Jose, United States

The impact of the event is from 9/07/2021 00:35 - 00:45 UTC.

The impact has been mitigated.

entry.title: Cloudflare DNS Analytics API and DNS Analytics Dashboard
entry.content:
Sep 6, 18:16 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 6, 17:33 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 6, 17:15 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with DNS Analytics API and DNS Analytics Dashboard. These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge. Customers using DNS Analytics are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

entry.title: Network Analytics Delays
entry.content:
Sep 6, 13:27 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Sep 6, 12:38 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 6, 12:06 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Sep 6, 11:34 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare Network Analytics is not displaying recent data.

This issue does not impact other analytics such as those for DNS and Rate Limiting.

Cloudflare is investigating the cause and will post further updates here.

entry.title: Image Resizing Availability Issues
entry.content:
Sep 4, 22:04 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 4, 17:55 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 4, 17:46 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Image Resizing the AVIF image format in some later versions of the Chrome browser, including but not limited to Version 93.0.4577.63. We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Argo Tunnel Creation Issues
entry.content:
Sep 3, 22:01 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 3, 21:39 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 3, 20:19 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 3, 20:14 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Sep 3, 20:09 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Tunnel. Some users are reporting errors when attempting to add new IP/CIDR ranges to their Tunnel. This does not impact Tunnels with existing routes.

We are working to understand and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Cloudflare Dashboard issues
entry.content:
Sep 3, 08:16 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 3, 05:53 UTC
Identified - Cloudflare has identified the issue and is implementing a fix.

We will update the status once we implement the fix.

Sep 3, 04:14 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard for WAF.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Some Customers Enabling WAF are impacted as they may not be able to enable it

entry.title: Network Performance Issues in IAD
entry.content:
Sep 2, 21:46 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 2, 21:39 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 2, 21:32 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 2, 21:25 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with network performance in IAD.

We are working to analyze and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Issues in Vancouver Data Center
entry.content:
Sep 2, 19:45 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Sep 2, 16:51 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Sep 2, 16:29 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare investigating issues with our Vancouver data center. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Increase of 1029 Error Code
entry.content:
Sep 2, 15:07 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Sep 2, 10:49 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Sep 2, 07:38 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating an increase 1029 Error Codes for specific customers.
More updates to be shared soon.

entry.title: Cloudflare Dashboard and Cloudflare API service issues
entry.content:
Sep 1, 13:13 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has resolved the issue and services have resumed normal operation.

Sep 1, 12:59 UTC
Monitoring - Cloudflare has implemented a fix for this issue and is currently monitoring the results.

We will update the status once the issue is resolved.

Sep 1, 12:45 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs.

These issues do not affect the serving of cached files via the Cloudflare CDN or other security features at the Cloudflare Edge.

Customers using the Dashboard / Cloudflare APIs are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed.

entry.title: Cloudflare for Teams: Gateway Issues
entry.content:
Aug 31, 23:43 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 31, 20:28 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. The impact is now over.

Aug 31, 20:26 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Gateway. Performance and connectivity through Gateway may be impacted. Users may see 60 seconds of down time.

We are working to understand the full impact and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Cloudflare Workers update delays
entry.content:
Aug 31, 15:59 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 31, 15:04 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 31, 14:08 UTC
Investigating - Customers attempting to modify or update their worker may experience delays in their Workers being updated. We are currently investigating the root cause.

entry.title: Increased number of 5xx errors in Taipei
entry.content:
Aug 28, 06:00 UTC
Resolved - Between 06:00-06:10 UTC customers reaching Taipei would have experienced an increased number of 5xx errors.

entry.title: Network Performance Issues in India
entry.content:
Aug 27, 15:54 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 27, 15:35 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Aug 27, 14:44 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 27, 14:42 UTC
Investigating - Network Performance Issues in India

Cloudflare is investigating issues with network performance in India.

We are working to analyse and mitigate this problem. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Cloudflare Dashboard Issue
entry.content:
Aug 27, 06:00 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 27, 05:27 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 27, 05:24 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with the Workers Dashboard.

Customers using Workers Dashboard are impacted, but customers can still use API to create the route.

entry.title: Upcoming Datacenter Upgrades
entry.content:
Aug 26, 12:46 UTC
Completed - The scheduled work is now completed. Further maintenance in other locations are tentatively planned throughout the rest of the year. We will create a maintenance page for these once the dates are confirmed.

Aug 3, 17:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 3, 17:00 UTC
Scheduled - Throughout the month of August 2021, we will be performing maintenance on various datacenters. Each window will be between 1am-6am local time of the data center. There is a possibility of a slight increase in latency during these maintenance windows. The most up-to-date schedule can be located here: Planned maintenance for Cloudflare data centers.

entry.title: Issues with Account Membership Invites
entry.content:
Aug 25, 19:24 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Aug 25, 18:48 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Aug 25, 18:32 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Aug 25, 18:27 UTC
Investigating - Cloudflare is investigating issues with Membership invites. User may encounter errors when accepting invites. We are working to resolve the issue. More updates to follow shortly.

entry.title: Increased HTTP 5xx Errors
entry.content:
Aug 24, 23:10 UTC
Resolved - Cloudflare has experienced an increased level of HTTP 5xx errors from around 22:20 - 22:23 UTC in our ARN (Stockholm) data center

entry.title: Magic Transit Degraded Performance
entry.content:
Aug 24, 23:00 UTC
Resolved - A retro incident has been declared related to Magic Transit. Impacted customers who have origin behind magic transit may see 530/522 in APAC region through Singapore data center. The impact of event is from 08-24 23:05 UTC to 08-25 01:13 UTC

The impact has been mitigated.
